column6:
Cozy waterfront condo overlooking the gorgeous Comal River!

You cannot beat the views of this lovely 2 bedroom/2 bath condo that provides accommodations for 6 guests. Fully furnished with linens, bath towels, cooking utensils, washer/dryer, 2 TV's and more! 

This property will have charcoal grills for your enjoyment as well as direct access into the river.
column9: Exceptional River Views from this One of a Kind Condo! - Comal River 353
